actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Brave
special_abilities.desc: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
